Directions: Arrange sweet potatoes and apple slices in a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking pan. In a saucepan, combine brown sugar, cornstarch and salt. Stir in the apricot nectar, water and orange peel until blended; add butter. bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in pecans if desired. Pour over sweet potato mixture. Cover and bake at 375 degrees F for 35 minutes or until apples are tender.
Ingredients: 1 all purpose apples, pared, cored and sliced
